author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Liberty Sees FY Normalised HEPS Between 1% To 15% Higher Than Comparative Period​
text:
Feb 9 (Reuters) - Liberty Holdings Ltd:
* SEES FY NORMALISED HEADLINE EARNINGS PER SHARE TO BE BETWEEN 1% TO 15% (BETWEEN 913,5 CENTS AND 1 040,2 CENTS PER SHARE) HIGHER THAN COMPARATIVE PERIOD​ ​
* SEES FY ‍BASIC EPS AND HEPS TO BE BETWEEN 40% TO 55% (BETWEEN 1 136,4 CENTS AND 1 258,1 CENTS PER SHARE) HIGHER THAN COMPARATIVE PERIOD​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
